increment_summary_description: Initial project setup including package.json, basic server configuration, and environment setup.

target_files.server/package.json: Project metadata, run, build and test scripts, and dependencies.

target_files.server/src/index.js: Entrypoint. Gets the app instance and launches servers.

target_files.server/src/app.js: Sets up Express app, middleware, routing, express-openapi-validator and swagger-UI for hosting the OpenAPI document.

target_files.server/readme.md: Documentation of what this repository is about, what it contains and how to run all its commands, and continue development in it.

target_files..gitignore: List files and folder to be ignored by git.

target_files.server/src/.env-example: All environment variables needed for the project.
